text: aur isalie ki vah kapataachaariyon ko bhee jaan le jinase kaha gaya ki "aao, allaah ke maarg mein yuddh karo ya dushmanon ko hatao." unhonne kaha, "yadi ham jaanate ki ladaee hogee to ham avashy tumhaare saath ho lete." us din ve eemaan kee apeksha adharm ke adhik nikat the. ve apane munh se ve baaten kahate hai, jo unake dilon mein nahin hotee. aur jo kuchh ve chhipaate hai, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
